dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S2750 IS: Airport Public-Private Partnership Act of 2014
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Kirk introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation

form.official-title: To encourage investments in airports through public-private partnerships, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Airport Public-Private Partnership Act of 2014.

section.header: Elimination of restrictions on number of airports in the pilot program on airport privatization
section.text: Section 47134 of title 49, United States Code, is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in subsection (b), in the matter preceding paragraph (1), by striking , with respect to not more than 10 airports,; and
